settings.question: Re-Engraving after resizing
settings.answer: Yes, if you would like to have your engraving redone after resizing, there is a $30 re-engraving fee. Due to the nature of resizing, engravings may become faint or not visible, and re-engraving is a separate process that requires additional time and labor.

settings.question: How long do I have to request free resizing?
settings.answer: You are entitled to request resizing without any changes in the pricing policy within 90 days of initial purchase. After this time elapses, resizing services may attract other charges.

settings.question: Can I resize a ring more than once?
settings.answer: Right, but the free resizing applies to one adjustment on an item only. More adjustments may attract a small adjustment charge.

settings.question: What if Iâ€™m unsure of my ring size?
settings.answer: We suggest going through the Ring Size Buying Guide for helpful advice on knowing your size. Alternatively, you can get your size professionally measured at any local jeweler.

settings.question: Do you offer resizing for international customers?
settings.answer: There is, however, an adding shipping fee will be charged since customers outside the country can access the resizing service. In this case, request for help from our support team.

settings.question: What happens if my jewelry is not eligible for resizing?
settings.answer: For jewelry items that cannot be resized, our team will aim to provide other options, including modifying the design of the existing piece or creating a new one.
